ygData.subject: Re: Dungeon advice
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Forgot to add, and a ton of experience, as everything deeper in was still blue to us. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Nov 22/99, jhenders@... wrote:
>
> The group I'm currently playing with with my new character went into
> Perma at 24 and came out with runed circlets, cold iron morning stars
> and mammoth leggings in just one night. We went to Sol A in the late
> 20's and early 30's and got just about every special item out of there
> as well.

Forgot to add, and a ton of experience, as everything deeper in was
still blue to us.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
